data.prayer: Jesus, please help the 44,121 believers in the county of Pu'er to be filled with joyful obedience at all times, as you modeled for us all.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Pu‘er, Yunnan, China
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, it’s possible most of the 528,083 lost people in  Pu‘er, Yunnan, China have never held or opened a Bible. Please change this, Father.
data.verse: Yet faith comes from listening to this Good News—the Good News about Christ.

data.prayer: Lord, please provide elders whose hearts are completely yours in every town in the county of Pu'er.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.prayer: Father, see the suffering of your people in the county of Pu'er. Deliver all those who have not forgotten your Word.
data.verse: Look on my suffering and deliver me, for I have not forgotten your law.

data.prayer: Father, 2.0% are known to be believers. Please, Lord call more today.
Lord, let it be said of the 537,479 lost in Pu'er that you have called them out of darkness into your glorious light.
data.verse: But you are a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for God’s own possession, that you may proclaim the excellence of him who called you out of darkness into his marvelous light

data.prayer: Spirit, help the church in the county of Pu'er do things that will multiply their numbers, not just add to them.
data.verse: But thanks be to God, who always leads us triumphantly as captives in Christ and through us spreads everywhere the fragrance of the knowledge of Him.

data.section_summary:
the county of Pu‘er, Yunnan, China has a population of 581,600.

We estimate Pu'er has 44,121 people who might know Jesus, 9,396 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 528,083 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 13 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, please give the 44,121 believers in the county of Pu'er the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that they might know you better.
data.verse: I keep asking that the God of our Lord Jesus Christ, the glorious Father, may give you the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that you may know him better.
